tyranitarite.name: Tyranitarite
tyranitarite.description: If held by a Tyranitar, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.

ultraball.name: Ultra Ball
ultraball.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

ultranecroziumz.name: Ultranecrozium Z
ultranecroziumz.description: Dusk Mane/Dawn Wings Necrozma: Ultra Burst, then Z-Move w/ Photon Geyser.

unremarkableteacup.name: Unremarkable Teacup
unremarkableteacup.description: Evolves Poltchageist into Sinistcha when used.

upgrade.name: Up-Grade
upgrade.description: Evolves Porygon into Porygon2 when traded.

utilityumbrella.name: Utility Umbrella
utilityumbrella.description: The holder ignores rain- and sun-based effects. Damage and accuracy calculations from attacks used by the holder are affected by rain and sun, but not attacks used against the holder.

venusaurite.name: Venusaurite
venusaurite.description: If held by a Venusaur, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.

wacanberry.name: Wacan Berry
wacanberry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Electric-type attack. Single use.

watergem.name: Water Gem
watergem.description: Holder's first successful Water-type attack will have 1.3x power. Single use.

waterstone.name: Water Stone
waterstone.description: Evolves Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, Shellder into Cloyster, Staryu into Starmie, Eevee into Vaporeon, Lombre into Ludicolo, and Panpour into Simipour when used.

wateriumz.name: Waterium Z
wateriumz.description: If holder has a Water move, this item allows it to use a Water Z-Move.

watmelberry.name: Watmel Berry
watmelberry.description: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

weaknesspolicy.name: Weakness Policy
weaknesspolicy.description: If holder is hit super effectively, raises Attack, Sp. Atk by 2 stages. Single use.

wellspringmask.name: Wellspring Mask
wellspringmask.description: Ogerpon-Wellspring: 1.2x power attacks; Terastallize to gain Embody Aspect.

wepearberry.name: Wepear Berry
wepearberry.description: Cannot be eaten by the holder. No effect when eaten with Bug Bite or Pluck.

whippeddream.name: Whipped Dream
whippeddream.description: Evolves Swirlix into Slurpuff when traded.

whiteherb.name: White Herb
whiteherb.description: Restores all lowered stat stages to 0 when one is less than 0. Single use.

widelens.name: Wide Lens
widelens.description: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.1x.

wikiberry.name: Wiki Berry
wikiberry.description: Restores 1/3 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.

yacheberry.name: Yache Berry
yacheberry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.

zapplate.name: Zap Plate
zapplate.description: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.2x power. Judgment is Electric type.

zoomlens.name: Zoom Lens
zoomlens.description: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.2x if it moves after its target.

berserkgene.name: Berserk Gene
berserkgene.description: (Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.

berry.name: Berry
berry.description: (Gen 2) Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

bitterberry.name: Bitter Berry
bitterberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.

burntberry.name: Burnt Berry
burntberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is frozen. Single use.

goldberry.name: Gold Berry
goldberry.description: (Gen 2) Restores 30 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

iceberry.name: Ice Berry
iceberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.

mintberry.name: Mint Berry
mintberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.

miracleberry.name: Miracle Berry
miracleberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a status condition. Single use.

mysteryberry.name: Mystery Berry
mysteryberry.description: (Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.

przcureberry.name: PRZ Cure Berry
przcureberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.

psncureberry.name: PSN Cure Berry
psncureberry.description: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.

crucibellite.name: Crucibellite
crucibellite.description: If held by a Crucibelle, this item allows it to Mega Evolve in battle.

vilevial.name: Vile Vial
vilevial.description: If held by a Venomicon, its Poison- and Flying-type attacks have 1.2x power.
